title: An In vitro and in silico investigation of the antitrypanosomal activities of the stem bark extracts of Anopyxis klaineana (Pierre) Engl
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Latif Adams, Dorcas Obiri-Yeboah, Michael Afiadenyo, Sherif Hamidu, Abigail Aning, Ebenezer Ehun, Katie Shiels, Akanksha Joshi, Maxwell Mamfe Sakyimah, Kwadwo Asamoah Kusi, Irene Ayi, Michelle Mckeon Bennett, Siobhan Moane
